reasoningQuestions.questionText: A block of mass $!$5kg$!$ starting from rest pulled up on a smooth incline plane making an angle of $!$30∘$!$ with horizontal with an affective acceleration of  $!$1 ms−2$!$. What is the power delivered by the pulling force at $!$t = 10s$!$ from the start?

answerOptions.optionText: Power delivered by the pulling force can be calculated using the formula $!$P = Fv$!$
Velocity of the block can be calculated using the formula $!$v = u + at$!$
The force applied to the block can be calculated using the formula $!$F = ma$!$.
The force applied to the block can be calculated using the formula $!$F = mg m*g*sinθ$!$.
The force applied to the block can be calculated using the formula $!$F = ma + m*g*sinθ$!$.
Power delivered by the pulling force can be calculated using the formula $!$P = W /t$!$
Work done by the pulling force can be calculated using the formula $!$W = Fd$!$
Distance travelled by the block can be calculated using the formula $!$d = ut + 1/2at^2$!$
Work done is equal to the change in kinetic energy of the block using the formula $!$KE = 1/2mv^2$!$
